overview_of_class: This is a year-long, Intermediate-Advanced level Korean course designed to further develop students' linguistic and cultural ability in Korean language and culture. The lexicon, tasks, topics covered in class are to address a wide spectrum of socio-cultural and academic settings. Students will achieve the competency in the skills of Communication, Comparisons and Cultures in conjunction with the National Standards.
name: Korean III
title: WCAS KOREAN 211-3-20 Korean III
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-req: Students must have passed Korean 211-2 with at least a C- or  be placed in according to placement test results.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This is a year-long, Intermediate-Advanced level Korean course designed to further develop students' linguistic and cultural ability in Korean language and culture. The lexicon, tasks, topics covered in class are to address a wide spectrum of socio-cultural and academic settings. Students will achieve the competency in the skills of Communication, Comparisons and Cultures in conjunction with the National Standards.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Completion of 211-2 or a departmental placement test for Spring Quarter

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: Various communicative activities will be employed with the emphasis on developing three modes of communication: Interpersonal, interpretive, and presentational communication. Also, various kinds of authentic reading and video materials will be provided to enhance students reading and understanding skill.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Grades will be given based on attendance and class participation, vocabulary quizzes, lesson tests, assignments, essays, oral presentations and written report.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Sogang Korean 3A & 3B by Korean Language Education Center of Sogang University
978-89-92491-39-6 & 978-89-92491-46-4: Conversation focused
Sogang Korean 4A & 4B by Korean Language Education Center of Sogang University
978-89-957826-2-1 & 978-89-957826-3-7: Reading/writing focused

subject: KOREAN
